scripts.build:umd: npm run build:umd:index && npm run build:umd:saga && npm run build:umd:index:min && npm run build:umd:saga:min
scripts.build:umd:index: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=development rollup -c -i src/index.js -o dist/redux-blocks.js
scripts.build:umd:saga: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=development rollup -c -i src/saga.js -o dist/redux-blocks.saga.js
scripts.build:umd:index:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=production rollup -c -i src/index.js -o dist/redux-blocks.min.js
scripts.build:umd:saga:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=production rollup -c -i src/saga.js -o dist/redux-blocks.saga.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:es
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run test && npm run build
